00072 void Mediator::setSnapfunction(NotifyEvent& event)
00073 {
00074         m_SnapGrid  = 5*event.getSnapToGrid();
00075         m_SnapAngle = event.getSnapToAngle();
00076 }
00077 
00083 void Mediator::doSnapMove(float& value)
00084 {
00085         float new_value = round(value*((float)SNAP_IN_MAXIMUM_UNIT/(float)m_SnapGrid))/((float)SNAP_IN_MAXIMUM_UNIT/(float)m_SnapGrid);
00086         //if value reaches about SNAP_APPROACH_PERC (25%) of grid value, snap in
00087         if (fabs(value - new_value)*(float)SNAP_IN_MAXIMUM_UNIT/(float)m_SnapGrid < SNAP_APPROACH_PERC)
00088         {
00089                 value = new_value;
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00098 void Mediator::doSnapRotate(float& value)
00099 {
00100         float new_value = round(value/(float)m_SnapAngle)*(float)m_SnapAngle;
00101         //if angle reaches about SNAP_APPROACH_PERC (25%) of snapping angle, snap in
00102         if (fabs(value - new_value)/(float)m_SnapAngle < SNAP_APPROACH_PERC)
00103         {
00104                 value = new_value;
00105         }
00106 }
